output-frames.label: Output frames
output-frames.tooltip: If checked, the specified number of frames will be recorded as screenshots and saved to disk. Per default, they are saved in the user/screenshots folder. This feature can not be used together with '$t(play-session.loop-playback-label)'.

hide-gui-on-playback.label: Hide GUI on playback
hide-gui-on-playback.tooltip: When checked, hides the GUI during playback. It will reappear after the recording ends.

hide-dashboards-on-playback.label: Hide dashboards on playback
hide-dashboards-on-playback.tooltip: When checked, hides the dashboard overlays during playback. They will reappear after the recording ends.

settings-combination-warning.title: Warning
settings-combination-warning.description: Enabling both <italic>$t(play-session.loop-playback-label)</italic> and <italic>$t(play-session.hide-gui-on-playback.label)</italic> will cause the interface to remain hidden indefinitely during playback. To reveal the GUI again, press: <keybind>

filename-input.tooltip: Automatically adds the correct file extension based on the selected file format.

overwrite-file.label: Overwrite file
overwrite-file.tooltip: If you enter a filename that already exists, this checkbox allows you to overwrite the existing file.

error-messages.title: Error stopping session recording
error-messages.invalid-filepath: Invalid filepath, cannot find filepath '{{filepath}}' for file: '{{file}}'
